Homepage.description: I'm a Frontend Developer with 3 years of experience specializing in modern web technologies. While developing high-performance and aesthetic interfaces that prioritize user experience, I bring projects to life using current tools like React, Next.js, and TypeScript.
what_i_do: I develop scalable, dynamic, and SEO-friendly web applications with React & Next.js.
I use TypeScript to make the codebase more secure and maintainable.
I build accessible and user-friendly interfaces by adopting user-centered design principles.
I deliver high-speed and seamless experiences with performance optimization (Lazy Loading, Code Splitting, caching) and modern CSS (CSS-in-JS, Tailwind) techniques.
I deliver projects on time and efficiently by adapting to teamwork with Agile methodologies (Scrum, Kanban).

About.description: As a passionate Frontend Developer with 3 years of professional experience, I continue to advance my career in modern web technologies. I strengthened my technical foundation with a Bachelor's degree in Computer Engineering from Harran University and further deepened my expertise through master's studies at İskenderun Technical University. After gaining industry experience, I now work as a freelance Frontend Developer in Adana.
About.journey_description_edulog: During my role as a Mid Frontend Developer at Edulog Eğitim Arge Bilişim, the experience I gained while developing innovative solutions for the education sector became the most formative process of my career. Building 5 different management and reporting projects with Next.js, AWS Cognito integrations, and performance-oriented dynamic pages using Islands Architecture were concrete examples of my technical competencies.
About.journey_description_habithouse: As a freelancer, the real estate management system I developed for KS Habithouse strengthened my mastery of the React ecosystem and my independent project management skills. The high-performance CRUD interfaces I built with modern tools like Chakra UI and Zustand became a testament to my customer-centric approach.
About.technical_description: My expertise in the modern frontend ecosystem enables flexible selection of optimal technology stacks tailored to project requirements:
technical: React & Next.js: Scalable, SEO-friendly applications with CSR, SSR, and SSG approaches
State Management: Complex state management with Redux, RTK Query, and Zustand
Form Solutions: Validation-focused form management using React Hook Form + yup/zod
Testing Culture: 85%+ test coverage target with Jest and React Testing Library
CSS Strategies: Modular design with Tailwind, Styled Components, and CSS Modules
Monorepo Management: Multi-project architecture and shared libraries using NX
Performance Optimization: Lazy Loading, Code Splitting, and caching mechanisms
About.philosophy_description: I have made it my mission to leverage technology as a tool to solve all kinds of problems. In every interface I develop:
philosophy: User Experience: Accessibility (a11y) standards and user-centric design principles
Code Quality: Clean code practices, type safety (TypeScript), and maintainability
Collaboration: Disciplined teamwork with Agile (Scrum/Kanban) methodologies
About.last_description: Building bridges between technology and human needs is not just a profession for me, but a passion. I'm always excited to take on new projects, collaborate with professionals from different disciplines, and push my boundaries.
About.last_description_1: You can explore the projects in my portfolio to get an idea of my work approach. I'd be delighted to connect about new opportunities where I can create innovative solutions.
